author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Leonteq AG: Net Profit Improves By 34 Pct To CHF 23.1 Mln In 2017‍​
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - LEONTEQ AG:
* NET PROFIT IMPROVED BY 34% TO CHF 23.1 MILLION IN 2017‍​ * FY TOTAL OPERATING INCOME ROSE BY 4%, DRIVEN BY 18% GROWTH IN NET FEE INCOME TO CHF 247.0 MILLION
* TO PROPOSE TO SHAREHOLDERS THAT NO DIVIDEND BE DISTRIBUTED FOR THE FINANCIAL YEAR 2017
* TOTAL OPERATING EXPENSES OF AROUND CHF 180 ARE EXPECTED FOR THE FULL YEAR 2018. ‍​
* TOTAL OPERATING EXPENSES OF AROUND CHF 180 MILLION ARE EXPECTED FOR 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
